# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-patterns

# Questionably acceptable forms of `in to`
# Personally, I prefer `log into`, but people object
# https://www.tprteaching.com/log-into-log-in-to-login/
\b(?:[Ll]og|[Ss]ign) in to\b

# to opt in
\bto opt in\b

# acceptable duplicates
# ls directory listings
[-bcdlpsw](?:[-r][-w][-Ssx]){3}\s+\d+\s+\S+\s+\S+\s+\d+\s+
# mount
\bmount\s+-t\s+(\w+)\s+\g{-1}\b
# C types and repeated CSS values
\s(auto|center|div|inherit|long|LONG|none|normal|solid|thin|transparent|very)(?: \g{-1})+\s
# C struct
\bstruct\s+(\w+)\s+\g{-1}\b
# go templates
\s(\w+)\s+\g{-1}\s+\`(?:graphql|inject|json|yaml):
# doxygen / javadoc / .net
(?:[\\@](?:brief|groupname|t?param|return|retval)|(?:public|private)(?:\s+static|\s+readonly)*)(?:\s+\{\w+\}|)\s+(\w+)\s+\g{-1}\s

# Commit message -- Signed-off-by and friends
^\s*(?:(?:Based-on-patch|Co-authored|Helped|Mentored|Reported|Reviewed|Signed-off)-by|Thanks-to): (?:[^<]*<[^>]*>|[^<]*)\s*$

# Autogenerated revert commit message
^This reverts commit [0-9a-f]{40}\.$

# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b

# Ignore common C# keywords
\b(?:class|struct|enum|interface|namespace|using|public|private|protected|internal|static|readonly|sealed|abstract|async|await|partial|event|delegate|override|virtual|new|this|base|out|ref|params|in|try|catch|finally|throw|return|goto|yield|foreach|switch|case|default|lock|const|volatile|unsafe|checked|unchecked|extern|sizeof|stackalloc|fixed|typeof|is|as|explicit|implicit|operator|sizeof)\b

# Ignore common XAML keywords
\b(?:Window|UserControl|Button|TextBox|ListBox|ComboBox|StackPanel|Grid|Canvas|DockPanel|WrapPanel|UniformGrid|Border|ControlTemplate|DataTemplate|Style|ResourceDictionary|Trigger|Setter|EventSetter|Binding|MultiBinding|RelativeSource|StaticResource|DynamicResource|TemplateBinding|Storyboard|DoubleAnimation|ColorAnimation|Control|TextBlock|TextElement|VisualState|VisualStateGroup|VisualStateManager|Path|Ellipse|Rectangle|Polygon|Line|Polyline|Geometry|RotateTransform|ScaleTransform|SkewTransform|TranslateTransform|TransformGroup|MatrixTransform|Transform|RenderTransform|InputBindings|CommandBindings|KeyBinding|MouseBinding|RoutedCommand|RoutedUICommand|ICommand|DataContext|Content|Name|Visibility|IsEnabled|IsVisible|Margin|Padding|Background|Foreground|BorderBrush|BorderThickness|Height|Width|MinHeight|MinWidth|MaxHeight|MaxWidth|HorizontalAlignment|VerticalAlignment|Alignment|HorizontalContentAlignment|VerticalContentAlignment|ContentTemplate|ContentTemplateSelector|ContentPresenter|ItemsSource|ItemTemplate|ItemTemplateSelector|ItemContainerStyle|ItemContainerStyleSelector|ItemsPanel|ItemsPanelTemplate|Template|TemplateBinding|ItemStringFormat|ItemBindingGroup|ItemContainerGenerator|SelectedItem|SelectedValue|SelectedValuePath|SelectedIndex|IsSelected|IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem|SelectedItems|Item|DataTemplateKey|x:Key|x:Name|x:Uid|x:Class|x:Static|x:Type|x:FieldModifier|x:FactoryMethod|x:Shared|x:Arguments|x:Reference|x:Null|x:TypeArguments|x:Bind|x:Input|x:DeferLoadStrategy|x:ConnectionId|mc:Ignorable|d:DesignWidth|d:DesignHeight|d:DataContext)\b

# Ignore commonly repeated C# methods
\b(?:InitializeComponent|OnPropertyChanged|SetProperty|NotifyPropertyChanged|PropertyChanged|AddHandler|RemoveHandler|Invoke|BeginInvoke|EndInvoke|GetHashCode|Equals|ToString|ReferenceEquals|Dispose|Finalizer|Clone|MemberwiseClone|CompareTo|Convert|Parse|TryParse|Format|ToUpper|ToLower|Trim|Split|Join|Substring|Contains|IndexOf|LastIndexOf|StartsWith|EndsWith|Replace|Remove|Insert|PadLeft|PadRight|Length|Count|Add|Remove|Clear|CopyTo|Find|FindAll|FindIndex|FindLast|FindLastIndex|Sort|BinarySearch|Reverse|ForEach|Exists|TrueForAll|Select|Where|First|FirstOrDefault|Last|LastOrDefault|Single|SingleOrDefault|Aggregate|All|Any|Count|Max|Min|Sum|Average|Concat|Distinct|Except|Intersect|Union|Join|GroupBy|OrderBy|OrderByDescending|ThenBy|ThenByDescending|ToArray|ToDictionary|ToList|AsEnumerable|AsQueryable|Cast|OfType|ToLookup|ToSet|Range|Repeat|Empty|DefaultIfEmpty|ElementAt|ElementAtOrDefault|SequenceEqual|Zip|Skip|SkipWhile|Take|TakeWhile|Append|Prepend|Aggregate|SelectMany|SelectMany|Concat|Concat|Distinct|Distinct|Except|Except|Intersect|Intersect|Union|Union)\b

# Ignore commonly used acronyms in C#
\b(?:ID|UI|API|XML|JSON|HTTP|FTP|TCP|UDP|IP|SQL|URI|URL|IO|GUID|DLL|PDF|CSV|TXT|HTML|CSS|WPF|XAML|MVVM|PRISM|DI|IOC|TDD|BDD|DIP|SOLID|KISS|DRY|YAGNI|WYSIWYG|CRUD|SDK|IDE|JIT|CLR|IL|LINQ|EF|ORM|DLL|EXE|CLI|UX|NPM|YARN|GIT|SVN|CI|CD|REST|SOAP|OOP|OOC|UML|UWP|XAF|XPO|MVU|GDI|GDI+|DXGI|DPI|PNG|JPEG|BMP|GIF|TIFF|ICO|OGG|MP3|WAV|FLAC|AAC|MIDI|MP4|AVI|MKV|WEBM|MOV|FLV|SWF|RTF|DOC|DOCX|PPT|PPTX|XLS|XLSX|ODT|ODS|ODP|ZIP|RAR|TAR|GZ|7Z|ISO|DMG|EXE|MSI|DMG|PKG|APP|SYS|TMP|LOG)\b

# uuid:
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-){3}[0-9a-fA-F]{12}\b

# hit-count: 57 file-count: 20
# https/http/file urls
(?:\b(?:https?|ftp|file)://)[-A-Za-z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]+[-A-Za-z0-9+&@#/%=~_|]

# hit-count: 22 file-count: 14
# IServiceProvider / isAThing
\b(?:I|isA)(?=(?:[A-Z][a-z]{2,})+\b)

# hit-count: 16 file-count: 8
# hex runs
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{16,}\b

# hit-count: 8 file-count: 8
# w3
\bw3\.org/[-0-9a-zA-Z/#.]+

# hit-count: 1 file-count: 1
# proto
^\s*(\w+)\s\g{-1} =
